name: Death: The Graduation & Death: At Work
name_original: Death: The Graduation & Death: At Work
description:
Two games in one The Graduation

You are sitting for the Death  Exam . 

With several informations you have to find the right person and kill them. If you succeed you'll obtain your degree.

At Work

Congratulation you've been promoted to the reincarnation service. Now you'll decide for each person's future : Rebirth or Burn. But be careful keep a good balance on earth.

Development :
  • Developed by Grimoire in 14H( code )
  • Drawings by Savonnette (characters) in 8H and Wally (backgrounds) in 6H
  • Made in Haxe,  with Heaps as the engine
  • Source code: https://github.com/Grimo0/trijamGiga2021
  • The game was uploaded 6h late.
